title: 12/24/2020 - HOUR 2 - Dancing Isn't the Steelers Biggest Problem
itunes:title: 12/24/2020 - HOUR 2 - Dancing Isn't the Steelers Biggest Problem
description:
Doug Gottlieb is in for Colin Cowherd as he and Joy Taylor discuss the latest around the NFL in this hour Doug discusses the news of Steelers WR JuJu Smith Schuster announcing he will not dance on the teams logo anymore during pregame, and Doug says they have much more problems than JuJu dancing, including QB Ben Roethlisbergers inability to throw the ball down the field. Plus, NFL the Steelers problems, former NFL Scout and host of the 3 & Out Podcast John Middlekauff joins Doug to discuss the Eagles QB situation moving forward and more NFL!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
